description:
A blind Kingbull fights with his last breath to get the Straw Hats one step closer to their captain. Luffy kick his body into second gear to protect his friends from dangerous foes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Almost to Luffy! Gather at the Courthouse Plaza!
Il Palazzo di Giustizia è più vicino
Luffy Mokuzen! Saibansho Mae Hiroba e Shuuketsu Seyo
Luffy en vue ! Rassemblement sur la place du tribunal
Луффи близко! Стычка на судебной площади!
كدنا نصل إلى لوفي! التجمّع عند ميدان المحكمة!
ルフィ目前! 裁判所前広場へ集結せよ
